descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=6]JAYSUS SWORDS[/size][/b]
[size=4]FOR LORECRAFT[/size]

[b][size=2]by ArcaneSmith[/b][/size]




[size=4]

[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959] Lorecraft 4.0+ [/url].  
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1002] Jaysus Swords V13D+ [/url] 


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/search.php?name=lorecraft&scid=&author=&mname=&desc=&size1=&size2=&downloads1=&downloads2=&udate1_day=&udate1_month=&udate1_year=&udate2_day=&udate2_month=&udate2_year=&ldate1_day=&ldate1_month=&ldate1_year=&ldate2_day=&ldate2_month=&ldate2_year=&endorsements=&images=&readme=&adultonly=&opensource=&page=1] ALL RELEASED CONTENT PLUGINS HERE[/url]

[/size]
[/center]


[size=3][b]CREDITS[/b][/size]

These are obviously not my swords, JaySus made them I\'m just porting them into Lorecraft

___________

Installation: 
___________

- Install Jaysus Swords
- Enable its ESM file
- Install Lorecraft
- Enable its ESM file
- Install this plugin
- Enable it.



[b][size=6]WHAT\'S LORECRAFT?[/b][/size]

Lorecraft lets you acquire, learn and manage craftables through books instead of having them cluttering your crafting list and handed out to you.

Check [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959] Lorecraft\'s page [/url]



[b][size=6]COMMENTS/BUG REPORT[/b][/size]

Post them [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959]here[/url]
author: ArcaneSmith
